0.post_text: State-of-the-art factory. It's all in the details! #Ferrari

comments.message: Time to build a f1 car then that can actually compete
Joseph Monniello le truc dont je te parlais l'autre fois

All in the details but not in the paint !

Don't get me wrong, Ferrari produce some of the most impressive driving machines on the planet, but when it comes to paint finishes they are definitely lacking in a major embarrassing way. As a professional detailer specializing in high end exotic cars for the last 14 years, I'd have to sadly say that the all but wonderful prancing horse has the most awful paint job of any automotive manufacturer I have personally seen and I'd actually be hard pressed to have said I have never worked on a Ferrari that did not have a paint defect from factory.  It's actually rather disgusting. To think people spend their hard earned money (and lots of it) and there is clearly no quality standards when it comes to Ferrari’s paint finishes is an outrage and just takes the joy out of that new Ferrari feeling.
Send me a application!! I've got enough passion (and OCD) to do the job!
